article_title: Your Guide to the Affordable Care Act
article_text:
The 2010 Affordable Care Act is a huge law that confuses most Americans. Our WSJ.com/HealthLaw page is designed to make it easier to follow.

The main purpose of the law is to create a near-universal system of health insurance for the country. About 26 million Americans are expected to gain coverage under the law.

There are a number of ways they’ll get it. Americans earning up to just above the poverty level – anywhere up to...
